thread.title: BRIEF-Rainy Day Investments Submits Slate Of Nominees For Election As Directors Of Davidstea Inc

title: BRIEF-Rainy Day Investments Submits Slate Of Nominees For Election As Directors Of Davidstea Inc
text: March 19, 2018 / 9:53 PM / Updated 28 minutes ago BRIEF-Rainy Day Investments Submits Slate Of Nominees For Election As Directors Of Davidstea Inc Reuters Staff March 19 (Reuters) - Davidstea Inc: * RAINY DAY INVESTMENTS LTD. SUBMITS SLATE OF NOMINEES FOR ELECTION AS DIRECTORS OF DAVIDSTEA INC. * RAINY DAY INVESTMENTS - SUBMITTED SLATE OF EIGHT NOMINEES TO COMMITTEE FOR ELECTION AS BOARD OF DAVIDSTEA AT ANNUAL MEETING OF SHAREHOLDERS * RAINY DAY INVESTMENTS - IF SLATE IS ELECTED, IT IS EXPECTED THAT HERSCHEL SEGAL WILL BE APPOINTED CHAIRMAN OF DAVIDSTEA BOARD Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
